paper_metadata.title: Using an exclusive data set from Indonesia in 2018-2020, this study aims to prove whether there is a relationship between the allocation of village funds and the level of hunger in the community

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: this study aims to prove whether there is a relationship between the allocation of village funds and the level of hunger in the community
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Using a quantitative method with regression analysis

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Based on Law No. 6 of 2014, the Indonesian Government began to allocate Village Funds in 2015 to eradicate poverty, especially in rural areas
evidence_citations.country_citation: Using an exclusive data set from Indonesia in 2018-2020
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Based on Law No. 6 of 2014, the Indonesian Government began to allocate Village Funds in 2015 to eradicate poverty, especially in rural areas
